excerpt: "CloudPlexo, cloud optimization and efficiency SaaS platform provider, announces the launch of its AWS Well-Architected Alignment Tool which enables cloud architects, customers and partners to evaluate or assess cloud environment architectures to determine their level of alignment with specific cloud solutions and industry best practices."
